entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
